repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
A multi-text manuscript, entitled Cāstiram Aintu on its additional title page, containing several works on traditional medicine:
TheCuntara nūl ("Book of beauty"), text in 33 verses (U2).
TheRāmarēvar paṭcaṉi (enlisted on the title page as: "Irāmatēvar vētānta paṣṣiṉi"), appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition, which concers supernatural powers, practices related to magic and yoga, in 108 verses (U3).
TheRōmariṣi cuvāmi cūttiram aṉpatu ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 50", "50 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi") appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition in 51 vesres (U4)
TheRōmariṣi cuvamiyar cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 14", "14 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi"), appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition on practices related with yoga, in 16 verses (U5).
TheRōmariṣi cuvāmi nūṟu cūṣtiram ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram - 100", "100 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi" ) appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition related with alchemy and yoga (U6).

msItem.title: Rāmarēvar paṭcaṉi (Irāmatēvar vētānta paṣṣiṉi)
msItem.author: Rāmarēvar
msItem.finalRubric: vētānta paṭcaṉi tāṉ atīta muttē (muṟṟē) {pcs} 108 kuru rām tēva cāmi aṉukkirakattiṉālē rām cāmi tiṟuvut=tira kōcamaṅkai maṇṇukkum mu?tiya maṅkaḷēcupratalattil irukkum periyavarkaḷukku toṇṭūḷiyañ ceyyum aṭiyeṉ ?ṉ eḷuti muṭittatu muttum (f25r-25v)

msItem.title: Rōmariṣi cuvāmi cūttiram aṉpatu (Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 50)
msItem.author: Rōmariṣi
msItem.incipit: mūlattarattoḷiyāy veḷiyā rūpāy mukkoṇa yētti men᷑n᷑āṉa citti mutal vātan᷑ colveṉ (f[1]r)
msItem.finalRubric: vicu {varuṣam} paiṅkuṉi {mācam} 11 {pcs} veḷḷikiḷamai cukiṟavāṟamum ammāvaciyam pūca naṭcettiramum mīṉāḷciyuṅ kūṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉa ..? rōmariṣi cuvāmiyār aruḷicceyta cūṣttiram aṉmpatu patiṉeṇ pēṟ cittar atiyaṉ [?] pātakiṭāccattuṉālē [?] aruṉācalam yeḻutiṉatu muttum {pcs} (f9/43v)

msItem.title: Rōmariṣi cuvamiyar cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu (Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 14)
msItem.author: Rōmariṣi
msItem.finalRubric: rōmariṣi cuvāmi cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu Eḷuti mukintatu muttum vicu {varuṣam} paiṅc[k]uṉi {mācam } 15 {pcs} vīyāḷakkiḷamai kuruvāra nāḷum rokṇi naṭcettiramum aṣṭṭamiyum cuṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉattil rām cāmi rām cāmi rōmariṣi cuvāmiyār cūṣttiram eḷuti mukintatu muṟṟum {pcl} śrī rām ceyam {pcs} .. ? (f6/49v)

msItem.title: Rōmariṣi cuvāmi nūṟu cūṣtiram (Urōmariṣi cūttiram - 100)
msItem.author: Rōmariṣi
msItem.incipit: mūla vaṭṭaṅ kuruvāṉa pātaṅ kāppu muttikku vittāṉa mutalē kāppu (f1r)
msItem.finalRubric: mupporuḷum [m]uṉṟāka niṉṟa coti mūla vaṭṭak kuruvāl eṉa moḷi tāṉ {pcl} muṟṟē {pcl} {pcs} rōmariṣi cuvāmiyar cūttiram pāṭal (f27/76v)

collation.desc: 9 folios = Cuntara nūl. Tamil foliation 1-9 (at several folios unblackened). The first folio is blank, except for the title and unblackened text written in the column in the left part of the folio (f[1]r). Initial part of the text is missing (f2r starts with the verse no 3). Folio 3v is unfinished - it ends with the verse no 8, while folio 4r starts with the final part of the verse 11.
9 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvāmi ruttiram a[i]ṉpatu. Tamil foliation [1]-9 (35-43).
6 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvamiyar cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu. Tamil foliation [1]-6 (44-49).
27 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvāmi nūṟu cūṣtiram". Tamil foliation [1]-27 (50-76).
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter-numerals on the left margin, Arabic numerals in pencil on the right margin.
supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation, in spite of bore holes caused by insects.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 135 (front cover, recto).
BnF bequest sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

Completion statement: (...) ituv ellām appā nalat tiṭṭamāṉa muṟai kayilāca muṉi coṉṉār naṉṟāka itai yeṭuttu nāṉ coṉṉaṉe [coṉṉēṉ] {pcs} 33 {pcs} cuntarāṉantar muppattimūṇum mukintatu mut=tum {pcl} (f9v)

Āti Ām naṭuvirunta cōti kāppu Akaṇṭa paripūraṇamē Atuvē kāppu nīti kalaivāṇi ?kantaṉ kāppu niṟaccaṉamāy [nirañcaṉamāy] niṟk=kuṇam vatikaṉ kāppu pātiyām taḷar kaṉaluṅ kāloṉṟāṉ paṣcaṉiyāy viḷaṅkun᷑ citti vikkiṉēcurap piḷḷaiyār kāpput tāṉē =1= (f1r)

Left-marginal headings: mataṉa vaciyam (f2r) tampaṉa maiyi [mai] vaciyam (f3r) [kakaṉa (unblackened)] vaciyam (f4r) tampaṉa maiyi vaciyam (f5r) [mōkaṉa (unblackened)] vaciyam (f6r) tampaṉa vaciyam (f7r) [ illegible mariginal heading (unblackened)] (f8r) tampaṉam vaciyam (f9r) [uccara ?ṉap pukai (unblackened)] (f18r) śrī ṟi āṭai cor [?] (f18v) kaṭuṅkāṉi (f19v) kāyaveṭṭ aṟāmal (f20r)

Text completion statement: vētānta paṭcaṉi tāṉ atīta muttē (muṟṟē) {pcs} 108 kuru rām tēva cāmi aṉukkirakattiṉālē rām cāmi tiṟuvut=tira kōcamaṅkai maṇṇukkum mu?tiya maṅkaḷēcupratalattil irukkum periyavarkaḷukku toṇṭūḷiyañ ceyyum aṭiyeṉ ?ṉ eḷuti muṭittatu muttum (f25r-25v)

mūlattarattoḷiyāy veḷiyā rūpāy mukkoṇa yētti men᷑n᷑āṉa citti mutal vātan᷑ colveṉ ālālam uṇṭatoru ayyā pātam aḷ[ḻ]akāṉa pāṟpati ttāy aruḷaip patti cālōka cārūpa cānīpan tāṉu cācciyuyaṅ [?] kaṭantap pātan tāṉe kāppu {pcs} 1 {pcs} (f[1]/35r)

tantimukattōṉ cataṅkaittāḷē kāppu cakalaporuḷāy nirainta tāyār kāppu munti uraittēṉ mutanūl aṉpatukkuḷ [aimpatukkuḷ] mūla mutt=tiṟikōṇa vāci vātam cuntaram pōl aṟivuṭaiya makkaḷukku tōṭu kuṟiyum iṭi nilamun tōṇun tōṇum intav urai patiṉāṟu coṉṉēṉ rōmariṣi nūlukk etira nūl oṉṟum illai t=tāṉe -1- (f[1]/44r)

Text completion statement and date: rōmariṣi cuvāmi cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu Eḷuti mukintatu muttum vicu {varuṣam} paiṅc[k]uṉi {mācam } 15 {pcs} vīyāḷakkiḷamai kuruvāra nāḷum rokṇi naṭcettiramum aṣṭṭamiyum cuṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉattil rām cāmi rām cāmi rōmariṣi cuvāmiyār cūṣttiram eḷuti mukintatu muṟṟum {pcl} śrī rām ceyam {pcs} .. ? (f6/49v)

mūla vaṭṭaṅ kuruvāṉa pātaṅ kāppu muttikku vittāṉa mutalē kāppu mēl vaṭṭamāṉa parappiṟāmaṅ kāppu vētāntaṅ kaṭantu niṉṟa meyyē kāppu kālavaṭṭa matiy amuṟtam appālaik kaṇṭu paciy ātti maṉakkavaṭu nīkki nāl vaṭṭāc citt āṭum - periyōr pātam nampiṉatāl rōmar eṉ pēr nāy eṉṟāṉē {pcs}1{pcs} (f1/50r)
text completion statement: mupporuḷum [m]uṉṟāka niṉṟa coti mūla vaṭṭak kuruvāl eṉa moḷi tāṉ {pcl} muṟṟē {pcl} {pcs} rōmariṣi cuvāmiyar cūttiram pāṭal (f27/76v)

origin.origDate:
Internal dates: U4: vicu 1000 paiṅkuṉi {mācam} 11 {pcs} veḷḷikiḷamai cukiṟavāṟamum ammāvaciyu pūca naṭcekkiramum mīṉāḷciyuṅ kūṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉa ??? U5 : vicu {year?} paiṅc[k]uṉi {mācam ?} 15 {pcs} vīyāḷakkiḷamai kuruvāra nāḷum rokṇi naṭcettiramum aṣṭṭamiyum cuṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉattil
Dated to 1780 by Vinson (1867) and Cabaton (1912).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 25, n0. 135..

Vinson, Julien (1868). Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 37, no. 135. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso, 1c = first column, 2c = second column, 3c = third column

text.body:
hari Om
cuntaramūṟtip pāṭal
unblackened
cuntaram nūl
y-itu v-ellām appā nalat tiṭṭa
māṉa muṟai kayilāca muṉi coṉṉār naṉṟāka itai y-eṭuttu nāṉ coṉṉaṉe [coṉṉēṉ] {pcs} 33 {pcs}
cuntarāṉantar muppattimūṇum mukintatu mut=tum {pcl}

pōtiya-liṅkam tuṇai {pcl}

naṉṟāka

ya cupayōka cupatiṉattil rōmariṣi-cuvāmiyār Aruḷicceyta cūṣt=tiram Aṉmpatu patiṉeṇ pēṟ cittar ati
yaṉ pātakiṭāccattuṉālē Aruṉācalam y-eḻutiṉatu muttum {pcs} kurupātamē keti ~
